description.full: Add the 18 FATE: Core skills. This module includes: Athletics, Burglary, Contacts, Crafts, Deceive, Drive, Empathy, Fight, Investigate, Lore, Notice, Physique, Provoke, Rapport, Resources, Shoot, Stealth, and Will.

athletics.description: Represents your ability to move quickly and gracefully.
athletics.name: Athletics

burglary.description: Your skill in breaking and entering.
burglary.name: Burglary

contacts.description: Your network of acquaintances and connections.
contacts.name: Contacts

craft.description: Your ability to build and repair things.
craft.name: Craft

drive.description: Represents your ability to pilot vehicles.
drive.name: Drive

empathy.description: Your ability to read and understand others.
empathy.name: Empathy

investigate.description: Your skill in finding and piecing together clues.
investigate.name: Investigate

notice.description: Your ability to spot things and react quickly.
notice.name: Notice

provoke.description: Your ability to incite and goad others.
provoke.name: Provoke

rapport.description: Your skill in making positive connections with others.
rapport.name: Rapport

stealth.description: Your ability to avoid being seen or heard.
stealth.name: Stealth
